value.title: Mayo Clinic Assessing Google AI Tool as It Seeks More Insights From Patient Records

value.title: Ontology of the everyday: PeopleReign's automation of IT and HR
value.excerpt: Automating language is not magic; it can take years of careful work to piece together what people mean in the context of corporate help desks, HR programs and the like. Such is the work of startup PeopleReign.

value.title: Ukraine and Russia have both weaponized facial recognition — in very different ways

value.title: Enhancing DLP With Natural Language Understanding for Better Email Security
value.excerpt: Natural language understanding is well-suited for scanning enterprise email to detect and filter out spam and other malicious content. Armorblox introduces a data loss prevention service to its email security platform using NLU.

value.title: GPT-3 the breakthrough on AI and natural language.
value.excerpt: In the artificial intelligence (AI) world, there has been a lot of hype around a newly developed technology known as GPT-3. GPT-3 was created by OpenAI, a research firm co-founded by Elon Musk, and has been considered the most important and rewarding advance in AI for many years.
